title: Aarya Antique Gold & Diamond Pendant
materials: Diamonds (N WT: 7.97). Features a radiant Hyderabadi polish enhancing the gold's luster. Diamonds are brilliant-cut
with SI clarity and G color grade
features: This pendant showcases a geometric design with intricately set diamonds, giving it a vintage charm. The design is reminiscent of royal jewelry. The open setting maximizes the brilliance of each diamond, creating a captivating display of light.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional Telugu/South Indian occasions like weddings (pellillu)
festivals (pandugalu) and modern events where a touch of classic elegance is desired. A timeless piece suitable for daily wear and special celebrations.
description: This pendant embodies the rich heritage of Hyderabad jewelry making. The antique finish adds a unique character, making it a treasured heirloom piece. The high-quality gold and diamonds guarantee lasting value and beauty. It's a versatile piece that can be paired with various outfits, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
